Title: Harvest
Writer: Craig Johnson (book), Hunt Baldwin (developer), John Coveny (developer), Tony Tost
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Bailey Chase
Plot: Longmire investigates the death of a farmer who was about to be evicted from his land, Branch and Cady investigate a lead in Denver on behalf of Henry, and Vic contemplates her future with the sheriff's department.
